name: Droppy
short_description: Lightweight self-hosted file manager and sharing solution.
description: Lightweight self-hosted file manager and sharing solution. Droppy is a self-hosted application focused on file-manager, utility, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Droppy on your home server to lightweight self-hosted file manager and sharing solution without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Droppy to manage your file-manager workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
